title: Gianluigi Buffon
summary: Gianluigi Buffon Ufficiale OMRI (Italian pronunciation: [dʒanluˈiːdʒi bufˈfɔn, -ˈfon]; born 28 January 1978) is an Italian professional footballer who captains and plays as a goalkeeper for the Serie B club Parma. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest goalkeepers of all time,[nb 1] and by some as the greatest ever.[nb 2] He is one of the few recorded players to have made over 1,100 professional career appearances.
